definition: to flash through (one's mind)/to dodge (away from pursuers)

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: In the moment and again the flash across is that girl's face, Qiong's eventually preoccupied of her is who.
sentences.chinese: 眼前再次闪过那个女孩的脸，琼终于想起了她是谁。

sentences.english: She was surprised by a wanton thought that rushed into her mind.
sentences.chinese: 一个放肆的念头在她心里闪过，叫她吃了一惊。

sentences.english: There was a rainbow of light and then they were through the hyper-space barrier.
sentences.chinese: 一道彩虹似的光闪过之后，他们就穿越了超空间壁垒。

sentences.english: His name flitted through my mind, only to be forgotten again.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字在我的脑子里闪过，接着又忘了。

sentences.english: One flicker and it was gone. Yet that was enough to set my heart wildly beating.
sentences.chinese: 一闪过后他便走了，但这已足够我的心脏狂烈跳动。

sentences.english: Once it's green-lit, the deals to the actors are made.
sentences.chinese: 一旦绿光闪过，就可以聘请配音演员了。

sentences.english: The kid stared at the Coca-Cola in his hand, thoughts racing through his mind.
sentences.chinese: 小子看着手里的可乐，各种想法闪过他的脑际。

sentences.english: Suddenly an idea flashed across his mind.
sentences.chinese: 突然间一个想法闪过了他的脑子。

sentences.english: Pictures flash through my mind like an old film from the fifties.
sentences.chinese: 画面在脑中一一闪过，仿佛五十年代的老电影。

sentences.english: Emperor quickly flash, but the arm had been stabbed.
sentences.chinese: 隋炀帝连忙闪过，但手臂已被刺伤。

sentences.english: His name flitted through my mind,only to be forgotten again.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字在我的脑子里闪过，接着又忘了。

sentences.english: After the lightning came the thunder.
Memories flashed through his mind like an old newsreel.
sentences.chinese: 往事像新闻影片一样闪过他的头脑。

sentences.english: A hint of trepidation shows on Hale’s face.
The idea flashed through his mind.
sentences.chinese: 这个想法闪过他的心头。

sentences.english: Occurrence of memory and one scene from the hall Yuhao flashed.
sentences.chinese: 有记忆以来发生的一幕幕不断从霍雨浩脑海中闪过。

definition: to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
(of a meteor etc) to streak across (the sky)/(of a searchlight, lightning etc) to play across (the sky)
to appear before one's eyes/to come into view/to float into appearance/to come back (of images from the past)/to emerge/it emerges/it occurs (to me that..)
